document_data.mainbody:
Manahath was a caravan guard from the Moonshae Isles in the midâ€“14 century DR. He sold spices to the drow of Menzoberranzan.
He could be encountered by adventurers in the underground tunnels of the plains of Icewind Dale, which lead to the Underdark. Manahath and his barbarian fellows were cheated by House DoUrden via illusion magic.
